questions.question: A plane wall of thickness (b) 10cm, length 5m and height 4m. The temperature at the left and is maintained at 96° C and right end at 33° C. The conductivity is given by: $$ K = K_0(1 + \alpha T) \ \text(where K0 = 61 and alpha = 0.5)$$ Find the temperature at x = 5cm.

A plane wall of thickness (b) 10cm, length 5m and height 4m. The temperature at the left and is maintained at 96° C and right end at 33° C. The conductivity is given by: $$ K = K_0(1 + \alpha T) \ \text(where K0 = 61 and alpha = 0) $$ Find the temperature at x = 5cm from left end.
